Text: Thanks!  This will be my first by Brad Thor.  I'll start at the first if this is good.  Thanks for the upload!

I do not suggest starting here, and not the first book either, as it was terrible. The reader of the first few books is just annoying but you really do have to read the second book in order to get more out of the other books.

With that said takedown through the apostle are grade A in my honest opinion. And the reader, george guidall, does an amazing job of portraying the feel of the book rather then just people reading text.
